title: Minimal Contribution from Manufacturing Exports
description: In 2015, Guinea-Bissau's manufacturing exports constituted only 0.00009% of its total merchandise exports, indicating a negligible role in the country's export economy.

title: High Dependency on Food Imports
description: In 2018, food imports accounted for 41.71% of Guinea-Bissau's total merchandise imports, highlighting a significant reliance on external sources for food supplies.

title: Limited Revenue from International Tourism
description: In 2019, Guinea-Bissau generated approximately $20,000 from international tourism receipts for passenger transport, reflecting a minimal contribution to the economy.
